name: The John K. Howe Co. Reviews

review.title: “42 years of rewarding experiences with national and global clients”
review.pros: Pros – Working with large firms of national and global business reach provides not only unlimited opportunities but great insights as to background, culture and what drives these firms. Learning process and participation gives us direction on how to best anticipate and expand sales within them, develop future sales & product efforts and allows easier and smarter pursuit of new similar category clients.
review.cons: Cons – Long hours are inevitable as client demand drives your timeline. Pressure can often become challenging in today's world when many things can disrupt your 'perfect' original plan or concept.
